item.description:
Emma & Windsor have suggested the next Meetup!

We hope everyone can make it to Puppy Mill Awareness Day.


Help Stop Puppy Mills

Saturday, September 18 (Rain Date, Sun. Sept. 19)
Salem Common, 12 - 4 PM, Salem, MA 01970

Come, have fun, network with other animal lovers and learn what you can do to save the lives of puppies on

Puppy Mill Awareness Day

One person CAN make a difference

ANIMALS AND HUMANS WELCOME

Doggie parade @ 2:00 (prizes for all dogs)

Raffle / drawing @ 3:30 (“stuff” for you and your pet)

Tables with information, services and pet-related items

Rescue groups with animals/info about pet adoption & more!


All proceeds go to Puppy Mill Rescue and Animal Legal Defense Fund


More info: http://www.nataliefem...
item.how_to_find_us: I'm not sure if there is a landmark we can meet at... is there a gazebo? Please email or post any suggestions!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel September Meetup
